name: .HPI File Extension
summary: Learn about .HPI files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Proprietary image format used by Hemera Technologies for stock photos and royalty-free images; contains a header similar to a .PNG image and stores color information much like a .JPG image.

content: Hemera software programs include BizArt, Photo Clip Art, Photo-Objects, and The Big Box of Art. Hemera is now part of Thinkstock.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
